website_summaries.verdict: Vivid set of oil paints with colors for those who paint portraits or are in a figure painting class.
pros: Eight high-quality, reasonably priced, large tubes
Thick consistency, and they blend beautifully with other colors or mediums
Create nice textures that give paintings character
cons: Colors are limited to neutral, mostly skin tones
If squeezed too hard, tubes might release paint even with cap on

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: The price cannot be beat on these oils. The tubes are very large. Usually in sets, the tubes are small and would not last through very many paintings. That is definitely not an issue with these paints. While I am only an amateur artist at best, I know these paints are high quality. The colors definitely mix well together to create the exact shade you want. After purchasing this set, I am definitely interested in purchasing the other two palettes by ZenART. It's clear the creators put a lot of thought and work into creating these palette sets to create paints that will work for all types of artists and paintings.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: These sets are fantastic. I've bought all 3 sets a couple of times now. The Portrait set combined with the Essential set will cover any color you need. Tubes are large size and with the sale price it's ridiculous not to buy them
customer_reviews.author: blake

customer_reviews.title: Use Only for Old Master Portrait Painting
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of these paints. BUT BE CAREFUL BECAUSE THERE IS A CLEAR PLASTIC OVER THE PAINT AND IF YOU SQUEEZE, THE WHOLE THING EXPLODES. Also, I accidentally grabbed this box to take to my painting class . . . I KNOW IT'S PORTRAIT PAINT . . . but there is no blue, no yellow, and no black paint in the set. This set is definitely for old master painting with good earth colors. But the paint itself is creamy and nice. Just remove that little plastic devil!!!!! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Must have paint set!
customer_reviews.text: The kiddo and I have been experimenting with different types of paint this summer. To be honest, oil paint always intimidated me. Like it was for real artists only. But it turns out, oil paint is really cool! This set has amazing pigmented colors. We were able to make some amazing canvas art with the variety of colors. The tubes were easy to open and squeeze and easy to close back up so they didn’t get dried out between projects.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: As an artist, I am impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about buying a brand I have never heard of, but I decided to try and see what happens because that is part of testing when being an artist...I found the paints to be a generous size for the cost and was impressed with the color and consistency of the paints...I am thinking it will be the brand I buy most often, I am impressed with the quality and the price!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality paint set! Ordered this for my 10 year old up and coming artist and he absolutely loves it! Great first set with basic variety of colors to use alone or mix for the perfect combinations. It makes him feel like a total pro!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in idea condition, on time, as advertised. The colors were just what I expected. They were clean and new. They went on the pallet with ease and mixed well with other colors from the same brand and other brands. This is a kine brand of oil paints and the price is reasonable, I will defiantly order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Byerly

customer_reviews.title: Really nice oil paint!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome paint. A great price point. I highly recommend for anyone who loves to paint with oil’s. Don’t know so much about beginners beginners, might want to start with a more student quality sort of paint until you get the feel of oil’s, but this spreads like butter! So creamy so heavily pigmented! Can’t say enough about the value of this paint.
customer_reviews.author: gimpy57

customer_reviews.title: A Art student
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find oil paints that I can be comfortable with especially at a good price. I really love the pigment in this oil paint! It’s so easy to blend the colors together too. I am definitely going to keep buying all my oil paint from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Vivid colors.
customer_reviews.text: I have been meaning to get back to painting after many years. I didn’t want to spend too much money since I’m super rusty. This set is perfect for someone starting out and even for more advanced artists. The quality is great and the colors are vivid. Attached is my WIP.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Oil seperated
customer_reviews.text: Oil separated, so when I attempted to squeeze out paint, oil came out, which left the paint harder and gummier. I asked a person who uses oil, and they stated it was old paint. So I am assuming it has a shelf life!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good paint but smaller quantities
customer_reviews.text: I needed some paint when I decided to start painting again and this seemed like a good selection. Colours are good but the quantities are a little on the small side, especially for someone like me who works big.
customer_reviews.author: juju

customer_reviews.title: Great sets!
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these sets and I use them almost exclusively. I wish they would expand their brand to acrylics. Really enjoyable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Winterberry

customer_reviews.title: Good basic set
customer_reviews.text: Great set to get a range of colors to start painting. The colors come out smoothly and have aged well on my paintings. FYI- there is no black, so you’ll have to buy that separately.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Erez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: I am a newbie with oils, but this set has been very useful and the quality of paint seems comparable to other brands that I have purchased. This was the second set that I have purchased. I would recommend for those who are learning to work with oils.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Awesome Set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a gift for an artist family member, and he LOVED IT!! The set is unique and has large tubes of paint. Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Kuvasz

customer_reviews.title: From An Artist
customer_reviews.text: My husband is retired and decided to take up his passion as an artist. We live so far out from stores etc and he decided to look for supplies on amazon. He was amazed at the value, and once he received the items they were very much to his liking. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality paint
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice if you could pick which colors you want
customer_reviews.author: Dinah L Bolotte

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these because they were colors I would use in painting portraits They are easy to mix and blend. The colours are very pigment and bright. I was not disappointed, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using oil paints and I am very satisfied with this palette! I purchased the Portrait Palette a few days ago and I am very happy with it. As a beginner I am grateful that there is a set like this rather than having to choose individual colors.
customer_reviews.author: gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful oil paints. I have been painting for over 50 years and these are wonderful. Fast shipping, arrived in great condition. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: good quality. Highly pigmented. Only concern they don't have black
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: Impressionist oil paints
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner in impressing painting. Colors are what I’m looking for
customer_reviews.author: lorelei

customer_reviews.title: Quality and convenience
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this company by chance, thanks to a gift from my girlfriend and since then I have decided to buy only their colors because they are of excellent quality for their price. The brush glides beautifully on the substrate, the drying times are good and are well covering. This is why I recommend them to all art lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Luca Del Vecchio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to palette
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased to get these paints. I was working on a large canvas and these really added to my palette. I finished up well and look forward to my next outing with these lovely paints as I get to know them better.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for such a product.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for harmless oil paint. I was also looking for a set of Goethe colors that would be suitable for drawing a mental image. Your product meets my two criteria. I couldn't find a store selling it in Japan, so I bought it at an Amazon shop. I'd love to use a brush, but it seems to be out of stock at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: 犬井由紀子

customer_reviews.title: The best paint
customer_reviews.text: The best paint I ever had. I can't wait to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Pavlov

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift For Painter
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my father who paints and he really liked it. His instructor also complimented it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful paints
customer_reviews.text: These are great paints at a great price love them
customer_reviews.author: Robert Harding

customer_reviews.title: Consistancy is nice
customer_reviews.text: Mixing the colors is a breeze, good pigment, good texture.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Bird

customer_reviews.title: Art supplies- painting
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed, since done if the things we’re in miniature sizes. I guess the price was appropriate but I would rather pay more for better quality and regular sizes
customer_reviews.author: Olga P Buffett

customer_reviews.title: The color tone is not what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Good paint for beginners but! For someone like me did not like it!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an artist but bought it for a gift. I was told they are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Raines

customer_reviews.title: Well worth my money
customer_reviews.text: Love the set. Great colors and very pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: shiela valencia

customer_reviews.title: Great paints
customer_reviews.text: My son is an Artist and he always chooses all his supplies himself. He loves these paints and creates his masterpieces daily
customer_reviews.author: Olena Lobachevsky

customer_reviews.title: I like thew colors in the set.
customer_reviews.text: I just received them and haven't used them yet, but have used and like other ZenART paints, which is why I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: C. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great oil mixture that has no equal.  Mixing colors is a joy!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything. These oils are smooth when you paint and are thick with deep colors.
customer_reviews.author: Hector M.

customer_reviews.title: Bless
customer_reviews.text: Best paint....made with so much love it oozes out when you first open it also got a free gift...and a thank you card I cannot explain how happy this product has made me
customer_reviews.author: martin wanjohi

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginner like me
customer_reviews.text: I used these to pain a sky, forest, mountains, as well as make skin colors and hair tones. As long as you know how to mix colors this palette is perfect for any style of painting!
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Strange colors
customer_reviews.text: The black has too much green in it. You can't mix a nice gray color. Alizarin is too purple.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sis for Christmas, she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: TyaBya

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE! GORGEOUS COLORS!
customer_reviews.text: Colors are extremely beautiful. These tubes are pretty large. I'd have to say this is the smoothest, nicest oil paint I've used to date. Definitely want every set!
customer_reviews.author: Esther StJames

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Have not used them myself, but looks promising!
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: Love these paints
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with these paints works great with wet on wet as well as traditional methods of painting
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: These paints are a nice set for recreational oil painters.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Beilenson

customer_reviews.title: These are realistic landscape colors.
customer_reviews.text: I think these colors are for advanced artist. Prices are kind of steep...a little. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Barroso

customer_reviews.title: Missing Color
customer_reviews.text: Suppose to be Alizarin Crimson! Instead two Cerulean Blue! What is this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gleb Shevelev

customer_reviews.title: the best oil paints
customer_reviews.text: these paints are the best quality i won’t be using any others
customer_reviews.author: Fyzul Khan

customer_reviews.title: I liked the size and price of this paint set and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product 4 stars because I am not actually using it. I liked the size and price of this paint set and sent it to my grandson as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors and a fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: My teens have been honing their art skills in various media and wanted to try oil painting. This beautiful palette is a lovely way for them to dabble without breaking the bank. On first impression, the tubes are surprisingly large - so often sets like this LOOK like a great deal but are practically sample size on the inside. Not so - these are full size tubes of paint. When we opened it up, the paints are very smooth and spread quite evenly. I will admit to being a complete novice when it comes to oil paints, so this set has been a lovely introduction.
customer_reviews.author: Majic2930

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, rich colors and a smooth, creamy texture make these oil paints a delight to work with. These are a fantastic buy as the tubes are the perfect size for my travel easel. The paints that came with the easel were in tiny tubes and were improperly sealed. That meant that by the time I got to them, they were dry. ZenART knows what they are doing and each color is properly plugged to ensure they arrive ready to use with no wasteful drying. I also like the company's philosophy and how they tie infinity ∞ into their concept.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna N.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this set as a gift and I have to say the paint is of my liking. I feel incredibly happy with the quality of this product and would definitely recommend. I’m giving it 5 stars because I like the product and I only find it difficult to dig up where in their site they offer the mixing advice when using the portrait set. Also, their customer support is exceptional, they reached out to me and asked me how I was doing with my set and finally mailing a free sketchbook as a bonus. Lovely oil paints!
customer_reviews.author: SusanP

customer_reviews.title: much more than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping and package came without any damages. The tubes of colors are much larger than I expected. I love the color combination in this set (impressionist). The handout also has the colors names as well as the opacity pigment code and Light fastness. This set would be good for if you're wanting to paint any Landscapes or nature type pictures. This would be a good set for anyone weather just starting or adding to your collection. Once our piece is done we are working on we will update with another photo to show off the beautiful colors of the collection.
customer_reviews.author: The Ryan's

customer_reviews.title: Low price for a lot of quality a product!
customer_reviews.text: Normally I pay $7-$15 a tube for paint of this quality and amount. I got 8 paints for $25! Amazing deal and awesome paints! Happy to be back to painting with an affordable and great quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C. Noethlich

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good value
customer_reviews.text: The reason I only give these 4 stars is that some of the tubes were very hard to open. With the soft tube body you don't have enough resistance to get a good grip to loosen caps that are too tight, deforming the tube and feeling like breaking the tube body open.
customer_reviews.author: Peter P. Kretschmann

customer_reviews.title: Great oils for professionals too
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent paints: they have a high pigment load, the palettes work beautifully together, great consistency and mostly single pigment. In addition they’re inexpensive. As a professional painter, I’m phasing our my old paints in favor of these sets.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Jfg

customer_reviews.title: Smoothe, buttery texture.
customer_reviews.text: I have just started painting with oils so I don't know a lot about them and have nothing to compare with. However they have a beautiful smoothe, buttery texture and beautiful colors. My only complaint is that a portrait palate should contain blue. People have blue eyes and you cannot mix blue from other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Al S.

customer_reviews.title: Oil paints
customer_reviews.text: I thought I ordered acrylic paints and when I went to use them it was to late to return. Oils take longer to dry which is why I prefer acrylics. The colors are nice and I like the bigger tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful palette at a great price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been expressing interest I. Art for over a year now and wanted to try oil painting. This palette is a lovely mix of colors and an easy way for her to try without Spending a fortune. The paints are in a great size tube and paints are very smooth consistency and spread nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Family

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Pigmented Oil Paints
customer_reviews.text: The oil paints are amazing. They have such a lovely, saturated color that is really nice to work with. They're easy to blend and clean up really well when it's time to put everything away.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: I had to purchase a burnt umber as this was a color I was told to get and wasn't in the set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set has all the basic colors I needed for my beginners oil class. The tubes are big. A great price for all you get.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, affordable
customer_reviews.text: Gifted these. Colors are nice, it's a thick paint. The artist tagged the company when she posted her work and the company reached out to get feedback. She was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: MThompson

customer_reviews.title: creamy and smooth
customer_reviews.text: This is a very flowing paint to use. Only problem I had was no blue. I paint a lot of coastal genre and definitely need blue too.
customer_reviews.author: dlr

customer_reviews.title: High quality set
customer_reviews.text: Deep, rich colors that are easy to work with. Tubes are huge and contain lots of paint. My kids loved working with a different type of paint and these will last us a long time. Work great on canvas. Very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: king110

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use great colors
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for my granddaughter. I think she wS painting as we unwrapped the gift.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Good oils
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of oils worth the money. Some seem a bit thinner than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckles

customer_reviews.title: Not water mixable
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was purchasing water mixable these are of no use to me with messy cleanup
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Kirkwood

customer_reviews.title: Good set for experienced painters.
customer_reviews.text: Not particularly good for beginners as they usually don’t know how to color mix. Fine for experienced artists. Fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Yellow Rose

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of paints!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice set & well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: DW in Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: After using these I am so excited to try their other sets. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Sue

customer_reviews.title: art
customer_reviews.text: Paints were a great quality for the pricee. Nice large tubs and great colors
customer_reviews.author: Elayne

customer_reviews.title: A good value for professionals and students.
customer_reviews.text: Generous sized tubes for the money. Easy working, good color saturation. I paint to exhibit my work in galleries and shows, and these paints perform well for me.
customer_reviews.author: jared sines

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sister, and she said they were high quality paints.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Paint is too thin and runny. I prefer thicker oil paints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfectly, no complaints - bought for mom, sure she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Erin Brooks

customer_reviews.title: The good stuff
customer_reviews.text: These are great paints. Really thick and bright colors, much better quality than cheap oils.
customer_reviews.author: Haley and Matthias

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the bigger tubes, I'm making lots of mistakes and usually use more paint ...
customer_reviews.author: Dale Mulford

product_meta.title: ZenART Non-Toxic Oil Paints for Professional Artists - 8 x Large 45ml Tubes - Portrait Palette of Eco-Friendly Paint with Exceptional Pigment and Lustrous Sheen - The Infinity Series
feature_bullets: ✅ 𝗟𝗜𝗠𝗜𝗧𝗘𝗗 𝗣𝗔𝗟𝗘𝗧𝗧𝗘 𝗙𝗢𝗥 𝗜𝗡𝗙𝗜𝗡𝗜𝗧𝗘 𝗛𝗔𝗥𝗠𝗢𝗡𝗬… using few essential colors to mix almost any color brings a greater balance throughout a painting; this Portrait palette includes Earth colors to achieve realistic skin tones, but is not limited to figurative paintings

✅ 𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗗𝗬-𝗧𝗢-𝗣𝗔𝗜𝗡𝗧 𝗔𝗟𝗟𝗔-𝗣𝗥𝗜𝗠𝗔 (𝗪𝗘𝗧-𝗜𝗡-𝗪𝗘𝗧)… professional grade oil-paints, with high load of the finest non-toxic pigments and linseed oil; experience richly soft, buttery consistency right out of the tube, for effortless color mixing, and working impasto

✅ 𝗣𝗨𝗥𝗘 & 𝗩𝗜𝗩𝗜𝗗 𝗖𝗢𝗟𝗢𝗥𝗦 𝗜𝗡 𝗟𝗔𝗥𝗚𝗘 𝟰𝟱 𝗠𝗟 𝗧𝗨𝗕𝗘𝗦… using single pigments where possible to ensure vibrancy and excellent coverage; carefully formulated by artists to be lightfast with high pigment load, they blend beautifully, and thin-out nicely, so a little goes a long way

✅ 𝗧𝗢𝗫𝗜𝗡-𝗙𝗥𝗘𝗘 & 𝗘𝗖𝗢-𝗙𝗥𝗜𝗘𝗡𝗗𝗟𝗬… these oil paints are safe to use, containing only non-toxic pigments, free from harmful driers and solvents fumes, and with no animal products they are suitable for vegans

✅ 𝗖𝗘𝗥𝗧𝗜𝗙𝗜𝗘𝗗 𝗧𝗢 𝗔𝗦𝗧𝗠𝗗𝟰𝟮𝟯𝟲… this oil paint set conforms to the toughest international standards which attests to the professional quality of these paints, and they are backed by our 100% Money Back Guarantee
